{
    "teamspace_id": "65e2d1b6a5fe3ba7010a2673",
    "project_type": "CoDE-SOFTWARE: LICENSE 3MTYP",
    "project_name": "iCRS: Customer Registration System",
    "customer_name": "900006 SNC Serenity Company Limited",
    "customer_contact": [
        {
            "name": "Thitiwut",
            "email": "thitiwut@snc-former.com",
            "phone_number": "081234567",
            "position": "Engineer"
        }
    ],
    "sap_code": null,
    "introduction_of_project": "This report outlines the plan for the implementation of a comprehensive Customer Registration Platform: iCRS, aimed at streamlining and enhancing the registration process for customers. The platform is designed to incorporate four essential functions: an Online Registration System, Basic Assessment System, Financial Assessment System, Online Approval System, and future compatibility with SAP system integration",
    "list_of_introduction": [
        "The Online Registration System will provide a user-friendly interface for customers to register their details electronically.",
        "The Basic Assessment System will facilitate the initial evaluation of customer registrations to determine eligibility and basic requirements.",
        "The Financial Assessment System will delve deeper into the financial aspects of customer registrations"
    ],
    "scope_of_project": ["Need to test add scope of project","Test 2","Test 3"],
    "objective_of_project": ["Need to test add objective of project","Test 2","Test 3"],
    "cost_estimation": [
        {
            "raw_materials": 2000,
            "direct_cost": 50000,
            "overhead_cost": 80000,
            "gross_profit": 3400,
            "currency": "baht"
        }
    ],
    "start_date": "2024-02-23",
    "end_date": "2024-02-29"
}
